const[year,setYear]=useState(new Date().getFullYear());useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const Promise.all([axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/income',{headers}),axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/expenses',{headers})]);setIncome(incomeRes.data);setExpenses(expensesRes.data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){console.error('Error
